verbs.description: annapolis honors victims of [ARGM-LOC: pittsburgh] [ARG1: synagogue] [V: shooting] the city of annapolis is honoring the victims of the pittsburgh synagogue shooting with many gathering for a vigil thursday night speakers which included religious and civil rights leaders talked about the need to denounce hate and to promote love peace and unity stop the hate and we are all in this together were projected on the wall behind the speakers at the vigil the star of david will be projected on annapolis city hall for 11 pittsburgh annapolis maryland annapolis pittsburgh synagogue annapolis city hall capital gazette gavin buckley allen robinson hearst television maryland annapolis city council sharon robinson baltimore david
